text: Alexisonfire is a Canadian post-hardcore band from St. Catharines, Ontario. Alexisonfire has six members in the band; they are George Pettit, Chris Steele, Wade MacNeil, Dallas Green, Jesse Ingelevics and Jordan "Ratbeard" Hastings. The band was formed in 2001 by the band members from Condemning Salemn, Helicon Blue and Plan 9. They released their self-titled first album on September 9, 2002. Alexisonfire split up in 2011. But returned in 2022 with the album otherness, which they won a Juno for that year. == Band members == *George Pettit – lead vocals (2001–2011) *Dallas Green – guitar, piano, vocals (2001–2010) *Wade MacNeil – guitar, vocals (2001–2011) *Chris Steele – bass guitar (2001–2011) *Jordan "Ratbeard" Hastings – drums, percussion (2005–2011) *Jesse Ingelevics - drums, percussion (2001–2005) == Discography == Alexisonfire released 4 studio albums: ===Albums=== *Alexisonfire (2002) *Watch Out! (2004) *Crisis (2006) *Old Crows / Young Cardinals (2009) Otherness (2022) ==References== == Other websites == *Official website Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:Canadian punk bands Category:Post-hardcore bands Category:Hardcore punk Category:Musical groups established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in Canada Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2011 Category:2011 disestablishments in Canada
title: Alexisonfire
